data.title: Very nice theatre and good performances
data.text: I was last weekend (august 19, 20, 2016) to see the show "Borderless Expressions" and was really good!; great tango and malambo dancers and the music by BLU international Duo was amazing!, an explosion of energy. I recommend highly this show that will be again performing on september 3 and 4. The theatre is small, maybe 80 chairs, but very cozy and nice. There is a list of events and performances in their web page.

data.title: Wonderful Community Theater
data.text: We have gone to many performances over the past two years and enjoyed each one.  You can reserve specific seats on their website which is useful to ensure that our daughter can see well without having a tall adult in front of her.

data.title: Great performance - The Miserables!
data.text: I was pleasantly surprised by  the cast The Miserables.  The local actors delivered such an emotional performance.  Wow!!!  Their voices were phenomenal! I never imagined I could enjoy a Broadway type performance less than 30 minutes away from home. I will be a big fan of this theatre.

data.title: Great value, Great entertainment
data.text: Must see in Stafford, great little theatre. Come out and support this great crew of actors. You won't be disappointed in the creativity, acting, and the price!

data.title: lots of shopping and restaurants here
data.text: I liked the area it feels safe and there are a lot of restaurants and shopping we came here to get away from mardi gras which was rained out anyway

data.title: Right at Home
data.text: This is a more intimate theatre where we have enjoyed the Nutcracker, Greater Tuna, Glen Campbell etc.  Nice to be so close to the stage.  Drinks in the lobby, plenty of facilities, ample parking and just a joy to attend right in my own 'backyard'.
